scripts.ganache: ganache-cli --deterministic -e 300 -p 9545 -m 'candy maple cake sugar pudding cream honey rich smooth crumble sweet treat' --accounts 30 > /dev/null &
scripts.test: npm run ganache sleep 5 && truffle compile --all && truffle test && npm run stop
scripts.test-ci: npm run ganache sleep 5 && truffle test
